name: simple_circle
description: Draws a single red circle at the center.
code:
set color red
set size 10
draw circle x=50 y=50

name: row_of_squares
description: Creates a horizontal row of blue squares.

name: concentric_circles
description: Draws concentric circles centered at the origin.

name: diagonal_pattern
description: Places small orange circles along a diagonal line.

name: line_series
description: Draws a set of horizontal black lines.

name: target_pattern
description: Creates a target with three concentric circles in red, white, and blue.
code:
set color red
set size 30
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color white
set size 20
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color blue
set size 10
draw circle x=50 y=50

name: checkerboard
description: Forms a simple black checkerboard of squares.
code:
set color black
set size 5
repeat 4 {
  draw square x=10+$i*5 y=10
  draw square x=20+$i*10 y=10
  draw square x=10+$i*10 y=20
  draw square x=20+$i*5 y=20
}

name: spiral_like
description: A pseudo spiral pattern using circles of increasing size.

name: cross_shape
description: Draws a simple cross shape using lines.
code:
set color blue
set size 10
draw line x=0 y=0
draw line x=0 y=10
draw line x=10 y=0
draw line x=10 y=10

name: square_frame
description: Draws two nested red squares to form a frame.
code:
set color red
set size 20
draw square x=0 y=0
set size 10
draw square x=0 y=0

name: starburst
description: A radial starburst using lines in alternating colors.
code:
repeat 8 {
  set color yellow
  set size 15
draw line x=0 y=0
  set color orange
draw line x=5 y=5
}

name: grid_pattern
description: Generates a 3x3 grid of small black squares.
code:
set color black
set size 5
repeat 3 {
  draw square x=10+$i*5 y=10
  draw square x=20 y=10+$i*5
  draw square x=30 y=10+$i*5
}

name: flower_shape
description: Creates a simple flower shape from overlapping circles.

name: smiley_face
description: Draws a face outline with two eyes and a smile curve.
code:
set color yellow
set size 30
draw circle x=50 y=50
set color black
set size 5
draw circle x=40 y=60
draw circle x=60 y=60
set color red
set size 10
draw line x=40 y=40

name: diamond_shape
description: Composes a diamond shape using four triangles (approximated by lines).
code:
set color cyan
set size 10
draw line x=0 y=10
draw line x=10 y=0
draw line x=0 y=-10
draw line x=-10 y=0

name: wave_pattern
description: Repeats small sine-like lines horizontally to form a wave pattern.

name: nested_squares
description: Draws multiple nested squares with decreasing sizes.
code:
set color gray
repeat 5 {
  set size 30-$i*5
draw square x=0 y=0
  set size 20
  draw square x=0 y=0
}

name: ripple_effect
description: Creates a ripple-like effect with expanding circles.

name: triangle_fan
description: Simulates a triangle fan using lines radiating from the origin.

name: spiral_grid
description: Combines circular and square patterns in a nested spiral formation.
code:
set color magenta
set size 5
repeat 8 {
  draw circle x=5 y=5
  draw square x=10 y=10
  set size 7+$i*2
}

name: polar_spiral
description: Draws a true spiral pattern using trigonometric functions for x and y positions, creating a smooth outward rotation.
